name: FlappyTurd
description:
FLAPPYTURD

I took the idea of the flappy bird and mixed it with poop and created something.

it has 4 levels, each level is different from one another.

In the first level; is a classic flappy bird experience where you have to get 30 points in order to proceed to next level.
the second level, however, is a fearful escape from a toilet monster.
the third level is like platform shooter game.
and the last level contains a boss fight.

CONTROLS

 Left-click to jump towards the player's angle.on the last level, however, you can jump backward via right-click.

In third & fourth levels the player will fire when jumping.

You can skip the cutscenes by clicking.

WALKTHROUGH

You can start the game by going  to levels and selecting the first level

First Level: You have to dodge the obstacles with Left-click and have to score 30 points in order to proceed to next level.

Second Level: While evading obstacles you have to flee from a toilet monster in order to proceed to next level you have to finish the level and go inside the pipe.

Cutscenes: Watch until the end and press space or Left-click to skip.

Third Level: Player now can fire when jumping so you can fight back but you still have to dodge attacks & obstacles or they will hurt you. In order to proceed to next level finish the level.

Fourth Level: You can now Right-click to jump backward which will be necessary to dodge boss's attacks.You can collect green shits&drops to replenish 1 health but brown shits & yellow drops will hurt you.

Boss has 3 states and each state has a different type of attacks. In order to proceed to next level, you have to defeat the boss.

Normally you need to complete each task to proceed to the next level but you can press numbers( 1, 2, 3, 4) to switch between levels, this feature will be removed when the game finishes!

END OF THE GAME

if you're interested please enjoy this flight and be careful to not let poop stains all over you!
